entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Granby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.1Â°C

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 51 %

Wind: SSW 19 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers and flurries beginning late this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening then west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
